mapper.select: select dpt.id as pipeline_id, dpt.name as pipeline_name, dpt.source_type as pipeline_source_type, dpt.source_id as pipeline_source_id, dpt.built_in, dpt.ci_template_category_id, dpt.enable, dpt.version_name, dpt.image as pipeline_image, dcts.id as stage_id, dcts.name as stage_name, dcts.pipeline_template_id, dctj.id as job_id, dctj.name as job_name, dctj.group_id, dctj.image as job_image, dctj.source_type as job_source_type, dctj.source_id as job_source_id, dctj.type, dctj.to_upload, dctj.to_download from devops_ci_template_pipeline dpt left join devops_ci_template_stage dcts on dcts.pipeline_template_id = dpt.id left join devops_ci_template_stage_job_rel dctsjr on dctsjr.ci_template_stage_id = dcts.id left join devops_ci_template_job dctj on dctj.id = dctsjr.ci_template_job_id where dpt.enable = 1 and ((dpt.source_type = 'site' and dpt.source_id = 0) or (dpt.source_type = 'organization' and dpt.source_id = #{organizationId}) or ( dpt.source_type = 'project' and dpt.source_id = #{projectId} ) ) order by dpt.ci_template_category_id
